a.n: Little House on the Prairie VI (24)

p.k: He Loves Me, He Loves Me Not Part 2 Part 2 of 2. To keep her mind off Almanzo's extended absence, Laura pitches in with Mary and Adam's new blind school in Sleepy Eye. Meanwhile, in an attempt to conceal a secret from Laura and her family, Almanzo falls dangerously ill. Back in Walnut Grove...
p.d: The Ingalls family (father Charles mother Caroline eldest daughter Mary middle daughter/narrator Laura and youngest daughter Carrie) owned a farm in Walnut Grove Minnesota. During the late 1800s the daughters attended school where they were annoyed by bratty Nellie Oleson. As the years went on Mary lost her eyesight and moved away to teach at a school for the blind and the Ingalls family moved to the Dakota territory and back. Laura met Almanzo Wilder a man who would ultimately become her husband.
